newsitem.title: INDIA: India ICICI completes $120 mln borrowing.
newsitem.headline: India ICICI completes $120 mln borrowing.

text.p: The Industrial Credit and Investment Corporation of India Ltd (ICICI) has successfully completed a $120 million loan syndicated by 13 banks from 10 countries, the company said in a statement on Friday.
The loan arranged by Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd for an initial amount of $75 million was later increased to $120 million due to the good response, the statement said.
The loan has a seven year maturity with a put and call option at the end of five years and has a margin of 0.62 percent per annum over the LIBOR, ICICI said.
With the successful completion of the syndicated loan, ICICI had raised $170 million out of the approved limit of $400 million for its external commercial borrowings, the company said.
Disbursements in the first five months of financial 1996/97 (April-March) were 29.19 billion rupees, a 32 precent increase over the corresponding period last year, ICICI said.
